reviewText: Phil Galvano II has carried on the Golf teaching of his Father and updated it in this easy to watch and learn video. You will not need the Golf magazine tips or Golf Channel nonsense to improve your Golf swing and ultimately your scoring. Phil II Golf Basics: Golf Instruction with Phil Galvano II, PGA shows you how to best create the perfect swing for your individual body type to get the most efficient swing possible. With practice you can make it a Trained Reflex Action that you can depend on and lower your scores. I have all of his Father's books in my library and have recently added both of Phil II's training videos and his Sister Mary Galvano's book on Golf. All can be obtained from Amazon at a more than reasonable cost. Thank you Phil and Mary, Dennis Anderson MetaphorGolf
